metadata.Title: CVE-2020-9498 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Apache Guacamole 1.1.0 and older may mishandle pointers involved inprocessing data received via RDP static virtual channels. If a userconnects to a malicious or compromised RDP server, a series ofspecially-crafted PDUs could result in memory corruption, possiblyallowing arbitrary code to be executed with the privileges of therunning guacd process.

criterions.comment: guacamole-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
